text: Hurricane Hunters are special aircraft that fly into or around a tropical cyclone to gather information (or data). Hurricane Hunters are only used to study tropical cyclones in the northern Atlantic Ocean and northeastern Pacific Ocean. == Other websites == * 53rd Weather Reconnaissance Squadron homepage * 403rd Wing Homepage * Air Weather Reconnaissance Association homepage * NHC Reconnaissance data archive * The NOAA Aircraft Operations Center homepage * Navy Hurricane Hunters homepage * VW-1 All Hands Alumni Association homepage *
title: Hurricane Hunters
